Execute Process.Elite 1: Combo skill Stress Testing improved: Hitting an enemy with Cryo Infliction or Solidification also causes the enemy to take Cryo DMG Dealt +7% for 5s. This effect cannot stack.
Execute Process.Elite 2: Combo skill Stress Testing improved: Hitting an enemy with Cryo Infliction or Solidification also causes the enemy to take Cryo DMG Dealt +10% for 5s. This effect cannot stack.

Freeze Protocol.Elite 3: Ultimate Stack Overflow improved: The ultimate also dispels Cryo Infliction and Solidification from the entire team.

Standardized Scripting.Elite 1: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant operator EXP material production efficiency +10%
Standardized Scripting.Elite 3: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant operator EXP material production efficiency +20%

Murmuring Session.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators a small Clue 5 Rate-UP: Cabal of Tranquility (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
Murmuring Session.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators Clue 5 Rate-UP: Cabal of Tranquility (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
